question.title: Will all of the following occur: (1) Democrats have a brokered convention in 2024 and at least 20 House/Senate Democrats sign a public letter opposing the plan to virtually nominate Biden early, and (2) Francis Suarez be the Republican nominee for the 2024 US Presidential Election?
question.body:
(1) Democrats will have a brokered convention in 2024 if the Democratic Party requires more than one round of voting in its roll call ballot to formally nominate its candidate for the 2024 US presidential election. Additionally, at least 20 House or Senate Democrats will sign a public letter opposing the plan to virtually nominate Biden early if, before the end of Sunday, July 21st, a public letter is signed by at least 20 House Members or Senators who caucus with the Democratic Party. Multiple letters with a combined total of 20 signatures also meet this condition. This is based on a draft letter circulated by Rep. Jared Huffman and reported by Politico.

(2) Francis Suarez will be the Republican nominee for the 2024 US Presidential Election if he is selected by the Republican National Convention as the nominee. This is determined by the delegates of the Republican National Convention, not by the outcome of the 2024 US election day.

para_P.title: Is it possible for the following events to take place: (1) Democrats hold a brokered convention in 2024 with at least 20 House/Senate Democrats publicly opposing the plan to nominate Biden virtually ahead of time, and (2) Francis Suarez becoming the Republican candidate for the 2024 US Presidential Election?
para_P.body:
(1) A brokered convention among Democrats in 2024 will occur if the Democratic Party requires multiple rounds of voting during its roll call ballot to officially nominate a candidate for the 2024 US presidential election. Furthermore, at least 20 Democrats from the House or Senate will publicly oppose the early virtual nomination of Biden if, by the end of Sunday, July 21st, a letter is signed by a minimum of 20 members from the House or Senate who are affiliated with the Democratic Party. Letters that collectively have 20 signatures also fulfill this requirement. This is based on a draft letter that Rep. Jared Huffman circulated and was reported by Politico.

(2) Francis Suarez will be recognized as the Republican nominee for the 2024 US Presidential Election if he is chosen by the Republican National Convention. This decision is made by the delegates of the Republican National Convention, rather than the results of the 2024 election day.

question.body: This question resolves as **Yes** if the New York Knicks are crowned the champion of the 2024 NBA Finals, according to [the NBA](https://www.nba.com/). It resolves as **No** for all other teams if they are eliminated from contention.

question.title: Conditional on the New York Knicks winning the 2024 NBA Finals, will USA top the Olympic Medal Table at Paris 2024?

Resolution criteria for the outcome: Resolves Yes if the United States is the unique highest ranked team at the 2024 Paris Olympics. Resolves ambiguously if the Olympics do not take place before 2027. Resolves No if any team achieves a higher or equal ranking to the US team.

para_P.title: If the New York Knicks are victorious in the 2024 NBA Finals, will the USA lead the Olympic Medal Table at the Paris 2024 Games?

question.title: Given that the New York Knicks win the 2024 NBA Finals and the USA tops the Olympic Medal Table at Paris 2024, will the same nation win more than one women's team sport at the 2024 Olympics?
question.body:
Suppose the following is true: (1) The New York Knicks are crowned the champion of the 2024 NBA Finals, according to [the NBA](https://www.nba.com/), meaning they must not be eliminated from contention and must win the finals. (2) The United States Olympic Team is the unique highest ranked team at the 2024 Paris Olympics. This means the US team must have the highest number of Gold Medals, with ties broken by Silver and then Bronze Medals, as per the official medal table ranking system. 

Then, will the same nation win more than one women's team sport at the 2024 Olympics? This question resolves as **No** if women's teams representing eight different National Olympic Committees (NOC) win gold in these eight team sports at the 2024 Paris Olympics: 

- association football 
- 3×3 basketball
- 5×5 basketball
- field hockey
- handball 
- rugby sevens
- volleyball
- water polo.

Otherwise, the same NOC must have won at least two of these events, so the question resolves as **Yes**.

The question can resolve as soon as it becomes clear one of these conditions will happen (e.g. neither team playing the final of the last event has won any of the others).

para_P.title: If the New York Knicks secure victory in the 2024 NBA Finals and the USA leads the Olympic Medal Count at Paris 2024, will the same country achieve triumph in more than one women's team event at the 2024 Olympics?
para_P.body:
Assuming the following statements hold true: (1) The New York Knicks are declared the champions of the 2024 NBA Finals, as reported by [the NBA](https://www.nba.com/), which indicates they cannot be eliminated from the playoffs and must win the championship series. (2) The United States Olympic Team stands as the sole highest-ranked team at the 2024 Paris Olympics, signifying they must earn the most Gold Medals, with ties resolved by Silver and then Bronze Medals, according to the established medal table ranking criteria. 

Then, will the same country dominate in more than one women's team event at the 2024 Olympics? This inquiry concludes as **No** if women's teams from eight distinct National Olympic Committees (NOC) secure gold in these eight team disciplines at the 2024 Paris Olympics: 

- soccer 
- 3×3 basketball
- 5×5 basketball
- field hockey
- handball 
- rugby sevens
- volleyball
- water polo.

Conversely, the same NOC must have claimed victory in at least two of these competitions, resulting in an answer of **Yes**. 

The resolution of the question can occur as soon as it is evident that one of these scenarios will take place (for instance, if neither team competing in the final of the last event has won any of the previous competitions).

question.title: Will all of the following occur: (1) The New York Knicks win the 2024 NBA Finals, (2) The USA tops the Olympic Medal Table at Paris 2024, and (3) The same nation wins more than one women's team sport at the 2024 Olympics?
question.body: This question resolves as **Yes** if all of the following conditions are met: (1) The New York Knicks are crowned the champion of the 2024 NBA Finals, according to [the NBA](https://www.nba.com/), meaning they must not be eliminated from contention and must win the finals. (2) The United States Olympic Team is the unique highest ranked team at the 2024 Paris Olympics. (2) The United States Olympic Team is the sole highest-ranked team at the 2024 Paris Olympics. This indicates that the US team must achieve the highest count of Gold Medals, with any ties resolved by the number of Silver and then Bronze Medals, following the official medal table ranking criteria. (3) The same National Olympic Committee (NOC) claims gold in more than one of the following women's team sports at the 2024 Paris Olympics: association football, 3×3 basketball, 5×5 basketball, field hockey, handball, rugby sevens, volleyball, and water polo. This implies that at least one NOC must have earned gold in two or more of these competitions. The question will be answered with **No** if any of these conditions do not take place. Note: The question will be resolved ambiguously if the Paris Olympics are not held before 2027.

para_P.title: Will Kamala Harris take on the presidency by Friday?
para_P.body:
This market will conclude with a "Yes" if Vice President Kamala Harris is officially recognized as President or Acting President of the United States at any time before July 26, 2024, 11:59 PM ET. If this does not occur, the market will conclude with a "No".

The main source for resolving this market will be official announcements from the US government, although a consensus from reliable news sources will also be considered.

Resolver

question.title: If Kamala Harris is President by Friday, will Trump's lead over Biden be between 2 and 3 points on July 15, 2024, according to 538's national polling average?
question.body:
Suppose the following is true: Vice President Kamala Harris is formally designated as President or Acting President of the United States at any point before July 26, 2024, 11:59 PM ET. This will be determined by official information from the US government or a consensus of credible reporting.

Then, is it true that Donald Trump's lead over Joe Biden will be greater than 2 and less than or equal to 3 on July 15, 2024, according to 538's national polling average? This will be evaluated based on the 538's national polling average for the 2024 presidential election as reported on the chart for the date of July 15, 2024, when accessed by Metaculus on July 17, 2024. A positive value indicates a Trump lead, while a negative value indicates a Biden lead.

para_P.title: Should Kamala Harris assume the presidency by Friday, will Donald Trump have a lead over Joe Biden of between 2 and 3 points on July 15, 2024, as per 538's national polling average?
para_P.body:
Assuming the following is accurate: Vice President Kamala Harris is officially recognized as President or Acting President of the United States at any time prior to July 26, 2024, 11:59 PM ET. This determination will rely on official announcements from the US government or a consensus of reliable news sources.

Then, is it accurate that Donald Trump's advantage over Joe Biden will be more than 2 and at most 3 points on July 15, 2024, according to 538's national polling average? This will be assessed using the 538's national polling average for the 2024 presidential election as displayed on the chart for July 15, 2024, when viewed by Metaculus on July 17, 2024. A positive figure signifies a Trump lead, whereas a negative figure indicates a Biden lead.

question.title: Given Kamala Harris becomes President or Acting President by July 26, 2024, and Trump's lead over Biden is between 2 and 3 points on July 15, 2024, will there be an armed forces conflict death between China and Taiwan in 2024 before June 6?
question.body:
Suppose the following is true: (a) Kamala Harris becomes President or Acting President of the United States at any point before July 26, 2024, and (b) Donald Trump's lead over Joe Biden in 538's national polling average for the 2024 presidential election is greater than 2 and less than or equal to 3 points on July 15, 2024. 

Criterion for (a): Kamala Harris will be formally designated as President or Acting President of the United States before July 26, 2024, 11:59 PM ET. The primary resolution source will be official information from the US government or a consensus of credible reporting.

Criterion for (b): Donald Trump's lead over Joe Biden in 538's national polling average is to be checked on the chart for July 15, 2024, as accessed by Metaculus on July 17, 2024. A positive value indicates a Trump lead.

Then, will there be an armed forces conflict death between China and Taiwan in 2024 before June 6? 

Resolution criteria for the conflict: Resolves Yes if, before June 6, 2024, credible reports confirm one or more deaths among the armed forces of China or Taiwan as a result of armed conflict between the two parties.

para_P.title: If Kamala Harris takes on the role of President or Acting President by July 26, 2024, and Trump's advantage over Biden is between 2 and 3 points on July 15, 2024, will there be any fatalities in an armed conflict between China and Taiwan prior to June 6, 2024?
para_P.body:
Assuming the following conditions hold: (a) Kamala Harris is officially recognized as President or Acting President of the United States at any time before July 26, 2024, and (b) Donald Trump has a lead over Joe Biden in 538's national polling average for the 2024 presidential election that is more than 2 points but less than or equal to 3 points on July 15, 2024. 

Criterion for (a): Kamala Harris must be officially designated as President or Acting President of the United States before July 26, 2024, at 11:59 PM ET. The primary source for this resolution will be official announcements from the US government or a consensus of reliable news reporting.

Criterion for (b): Donald Trump's lead over Joe Biden in 538's national polling average will be verified using the chart for July 15, 2024, accessed by Metaculus on July 17, 2024. A positive figure indicates a Trump lead.

Then, will there be any military conflict-related fatalities between China and Taiwan in 2024 before June 6? 

Resolution criteria for the conflict: The answer will be Yes if credible reports confirm one or more deaths among the armed forces of China or Taiwan due to armed conflict between the two parties before June 6, 2024.

question.title: Will both of the following occur: (a) Kamala Harris becomes President or Acting President by July 26, 2024, and Trump's lead over Biden is greater than 2 and less than or equal to 3 on July 15, 2024, and (b) Before June 6, 2024, there is an armed forces conflict death between China and Taiwan?
question.body:
(a) Kamala Harris will be formally designated as President or Acting President of the United States at any point before July 26, 2024, 11:59 PM ET. The primary resolution source for this will be official information from the US government, however a consensus of credible reporting will also be used.

Donald Trump's lead over Joe Biden in 538's national polling average for the 2024 presidential election will be greater than 2 and less than or equal to 3 points as reported on the chart for the date of July 15, 2024, when accessed by Metaculus on July 17, 2024. A positive value means a Trump lead, while a negative value means Biden is leading.

(b) This question will resolve as **Yes** if, before June 6th, 2024, credible reports confirm one or more deaths among the armed forces of China or Taiwan as a result of armed conflict between the two parties.

para_P.title: Is it possible that both of the following will take place: (a) Kamala Harris is appointed as President or Acting President by July 26, 2024, and Trump's advantage over Biden is more than 2 and at most 3 on July 15, 2024, and (b) Prior to June 6, 2024, there is a military conflict resulting in fatalities between China and Taiwan?
para_P.body:
(a) Kamala Harris will officially be recognized as President or Acting President of the United States at any time before July 26, 2024, 11:59 PM ET. The main source for determining this will be official announcements from the US government, but a consensus of reliable reporting will also be considered.

Donald Trump's lead over Joe Biden in the national polling average from 538 for the 2024 presidential election will be more than 2 and at most 3 points as reported on the chart for July 15, 2024, when checked by Metaculus on July 17, 2024. A positive value indicates a lead for Trump, while a negative value indicates Biden is ahead.

(b) This question will be marked as **Yes** if, before June 6th, 2024, credible sources verify one or more fatalities among the military forces of China or Taiwan due to armed conflict between the two.

question.title: Will the Month-over-Month US Core CPI increase by more than 0.1% in July?
question.body:
Resolves YES if the seasonally adjusted Core CPI for July 2024 increases by more than 0.1% compared to June 2024.

The Data for resolution will be https://fred.stlouisfed.org/series/CPILFESL and will use the exact (not rounded) value.

para_P.title: Is there a possibility that the US Core CPI will rise by over 0.1% from June to July?
para_P.body:
This will be considered a YES if the seasonally adjusted Core CPI for July 2024 shows an increase exceeding 0.1% when compared to June 2024.

The resolution will be based on data from https://fred.stlouisfed.org/series/CPILFESL, using the precise (not rounded) figures.

question.title: Conditional on the US Core CPI increasing by more than 0.1% in July, will Trump's lead over Biden be greater than 2 and less than or equal to 3 on July 15, 2024, according to 538's national polling average?
question.body:
Suppose the following is true: The seasonally adjusted Core CPI for July 2024 increases by more than 0.1% compared to June 2024, based on the exact (not rounded) value from https://fred.stlouisfed.org/series/CPILFESL.

Then is it true that Donald Trump's lead over Joe Biden, according to 538's national polling average for the 2024 presidential election, will be greater than 2 and less than or equal to 3 on July 15, 2024? This will be determined by the value reported on the chart for July 15, 2024, when accessed by Metaculus on July 17, 2024, where a positive value indicates a Trump lead and a negative value indicates a Biden lead.

para_P.title: Given that the US Core CPI rises by more than 0.1% in July, will Donald Trump's advantage over Joe Biden be more than 2 but not exceed 3 on July 15, 2024, based on 538's national polling average?
para_P.body:
Assuming the following holds: The seasonally adjusted Core CPI for July 2024 shows an increase of more than 0.1% compared to June 2024, according to the precise (not rounded) figure from https://fred.stlouisfed.org/series/CPILFESL.

Is it then accurate to say that Donald Trump's lead over Joe Biden, as per 538's national polling average for the 2024 presidential election, will be greater than 2 and at most 3 on July 15, 2024? This will be ascertained by the value displayed on the chart for July 15, 2024, when consulted by Metaculus on July 17, 2024, where a positive figure signifies a Trump lead and a negative figure signifies a Biden lead.

question.title: Given both (a) US Core CPI increases by more than 0.1% in July 2024 and (b) Trump's lead over Biden is between 2 and 3 on July 15, 2024, will Israel expand its ground invasion to Rafah before June 1, 2024?
question.body:
Suppose the following two conditions are true:

(a) The seasonally adjusted Core CPI for July 2024 increases by more than 0.1% compared to June 2024. The data for resolution will be from https://fred.stlouisfed.org/series/CPILFESL and will use the exact (not rounded) value.

(b) Donald Trump's lead over Joe Biden in 538's national polling average for the 2024 presidential election as reported on the chart for the date of July 15, 2024, when accessed by Metaculus on July 17, 2024, is greater than 2 and less than or equal to 3. A positive value means a Trump lead, while a negative value means Biden is leading.

Then, will Israel expand its ground invasion to the city of Rafah before June 1, 2024? This question will resolve **Yes** if the [Institute for the Study of War](https://storymaps.arcgis.com/stories/2e746151991643e39e64780f0674f7dd) (ISW) reports Israeli military operations on its map at any of six locations surrounding Rafah (the specific locations are shown in the map embedded below) before June 1, 2024.

para_P.title: If both (a) the US Core CPI rises by over 0.1% in July 2024 and (b) Trump's margin over Biden is between 2 and 3 on July 15, 2024, will Israel extend its ground offensive to Rafah prior to June 1, 2024?
para_P.body:
Assuming the following two scenarios hold true:

(a) The seasonally adjusted Core CPI for July 2024 shows an increase of more than 0.1% compared to June 2024. The resolution data will be sourced from https://fred.stlouisfed.org/series/CPILFESL and will use the precise (not rounded) figure.

(b) Donald Trump's advantage over Joe Biden in 538's national polling average for the 2024 presidential election, as indicated on the chart for the date of July 15, 2024, when viewed by Metaculus on July 17, 2024, is greater than 2 and less than or equal to 3. A positive number indicates a Trump lead, while a negative number indicates Biden is in front.

Then, will Israel extend its ground offensive to the city of Rafah before June 1, 2024? This inquiry will be resolved **Yes** if the [Institute for the Study of War](https://storymaps.arcgis.com/stories/2e746151991643e39e64780f0674f7dd) (ISW) documents Israeli military actions on its map at any of six specified sites surrounding Rafah (the exact locations are illustrated in the map below) before June 1, 2024.

question.title: Will all of the following occur: (a) The Month-over-Month US Core CPI increase by more than 0.1% in July 2024, (b) Trump's lead over Biden be greater than 2 and less than or equal to 3 on July 15, 2024, according to 538's national polling average, and (c) Israel expand its ground invasion to the city of Rafah before June 1, 2024?
question.body:
(a) Resolves YES if the seasonally adjusted Core CPI for July 2024 increases by more than 0.1% compared to June 2024. The data for resolution will be https://fred.stlouisfed.org/series/CPILFESL and will use the exact (not rounded) value.

(b) Resolves YES if Donald Trump's lead over Joe Biden in 538's national polling average for the 2024 presidential election as reported on the chart for the date of July 15, 2024, when accessed by Metaculus on July 17, 2024, is greater than 2 and less than or equal to 3. A positive value means a Trump lead, while a negative value means Biden is leading.

(c) Resolves YES if the Institute for the Study of War (ISW) reports Israeli military operations on its map at any of six locations surrounding Rafah before June 1, 2024.

para_P.title: Are all of the following events going to take place: (a) The US Core CPI will rise by over 0.1% month-over-month in July 2024, (b) Trump's advantage over Biden will be more than 2 and at most 3 on July 15, 2024, according to 538's national polling average, and (c) Israel will extend its ground invasion to the city of Rafah prior to June 1, 2024?
para_P.body:
(a) Resolves YES if the seasonally adjusted Core CPI for July 2024 shows an increase greater than 0.1% compared to June 2024. The resolution data will be sourced from https://fred.stlouisfed.org/series/CPILFESL and will utilize the precise (not rounded) figure.

(b) Resolves YES if Donald Trump’s lead over Joe Biden in 538's national polling average for the 2024 presidential election, as shown on the chart for July 15, 2024, when checked by Metaculus on July 17, 2024, is greater than 2 and less than or equal to 3. A positive figure indicates a Trump lead, while a negative figure indicates Biden is ahead.

(c) Resolves YES if the Institute for the Study of War (ISW) indicates Israeli military actions on its map at any of six sites surrounding Rafah before June 1, 2024.

question.title: Will Donald Trump testify at the hush money trial?
question.body: This question will resolve as **Yes** if [credible sources](https://www.metaculus.com/help/faq/#definitions) report Donald Trump has testified, whether in person or remotely, at the [trial](https://iapps.courts.state.ny.us/webcrim_attorney/Detail?which=case&docketNumber=q23XFOwZRDQ1d4LrNRdw2clqCMt/CzUoG/kRII/7Nmg=&countyId=K4i18rFVPQh5HTQ/kUoO3Q==&docketId=3Y4iKU5oHM75AtDme2cPhw==&docketDseq=T/O1YN_PLUS_BG65HkOeqEnpAkw==&defendantName=TRUMP,+DONALD&court=New+York+Supreme+Criminal+Court&courtType=U&recordType=U&recordNum=) concerning the so-called "hush money" payments to Stormy Daniels.

para_P.title: Will Donald Trump provide testimony at the hush money trial?
para_P.body: This inquiry will be resolved as **Yes** if [reliable sources](https://www.metaculus.com/help/faq/#definitions) indicate that Donald Trump has given testimony, whether in person or via remote means, at the [trial](https://iapps.courts.state.ny.us/webcrim_attorney/Detail?which=case&docketNumber=q23XFOwZRDQ1d4LrNRdw2clqCMt/CzUoG/kRII/7Nmg=&countyId=K4i18rFVPQh5HTQ/kUoO3Q==&docketId=3Y4iKU5oHM75AtDme2cPhw==&docketDseq=T/O1YN_PLUS_BG65HkOeqEnpAkw==&defendantName=TRUMP,+DONALD&court=New+York+Supreme+Criminal+Court&courtType=U&recordType=U&recordNum=) regarding the alleged "hush money" payments made to Stormy Daniels.

question.title: Given Donald Trump testifies at the hush money trial, will Israel carry out a deadly attack within Iran before May 1, 2024?
question.body: Suppose the following is true: Donald Trump testifies at the trial concerning the so-called "hush money" payments to Stormy Daniels, as reported by credible sources. Then, will Israel carry out an attack attributed to them within Iran's borders that leads to the death of at least five individuals, as reported by credible sources, before May 1, 2024?

para_P.title: If Donald Trump provides testimony in the hush money trial, will Israel execute a lethal strike inside Iran prior to May 1, 2024?
para_P.body: Assuming the following holds true: Donald Trump gives testimony in the case related to the alleged "hush money" payments to Stormy Daniels, according to reliable sources. Then, will Israel conduct an operation within Iran's territory that results in the deaths of no fewer than five people, as reported by trustworthy sources, before May 1, 2024?

question.title: Given both Donald Trump testifies at the hush money trial and Israel carries out a deadly attack within Iran before May 1, 2024, will Biden be declared incapacitated under the 25th Amendment Section 4 before August?
question.body:
Suppose the following is true: Both (a) credible sources report that Donald Trump has testified, whether in person or remotely, at the trial concerning the so-called "hush money" payments to Stormy Daniels, and (b) credible reports indicate that an attack attributed to Israel, occurring within Iran's borders, has led to the death of at least five individuals between the date of this question's publication and May 1, 2024. Then, will the Vice President and a majority of the Cabinet (or other relevant body) invoke Section 4 of the 25th Amendment to formally declare that "the President is unable to discharge the powers and duties of his office" and cause the Vice President to serve as Acting President, before August 2024 (Eastern time)?

Note: The duration of the incapacity does not matter for this question. Biden exiting the office of the Presidency by death, resignation, etc., does not count. Biden invoking section 3 of the 25th amendment does not count.

para_P.title: If both Donald Trump provides testimony at the hush money trial and Israel executes a lethal strike within Iran prior to May 1, 2024, will Biden be deemed incapacitated under Section 4 of the 25th Amendment before August?
para_P.body:
Assuming the following holds true: (a) reliable sources confirm that Donald Trump has given testimony, whether in person or via remote means, at the trial regarding the alleged "hush money" payments to Stormy Daniels, and (b) trustworthy reports suggest that an assault attributed to Israel, taking place within the territory of Iran, has resulted in the deaths of at least five people between the time this question is asked and May 1, 2024. Then, will the Vice President along with a majority of the Cabinet (or another pertinent body) activate Section 4 of the 25th Amendment to officially state that "the President is unable to fulfill the powers and responsibilities of his office" and allow the Vice President to assume the role of Acting President, before August 2024 (Eastern time)?

Note: The length of the incapacity is irrelevant for this inquiry. Biden leaving the Presidency due to death, resignation, etc., does not apply. Biden invoking Section 3 of the 25th Amendment is not considered.

question.title: Will all of the following occur before their respective deadlines: (a) Donald Trump testifies at the hush money trial (b) Israel carries out a deadly attack within Iran (c) Biden is declared incapacitated under the 25th Amendment Section 4?
question.body: This question resolves as **Yes** only if all of the following conditions are met: (a) Credible sources report that Donald Trump has testified, whether in person or remotely, at the trial concerning the so-called "hush money" payments to Stormy Daniels, before May 1, 2024; (b) Credible reports indicate that an attack attributed to Israel, occurring within Iran's borders, has led to the death of at least five individuals, between the date of this question's publication and May 1, 2024; and (c) The Vice President and a majority of the Cabinet (or other relevant body) invoke Section 4 of the 25th Amendment to formally declare that "the President is unable to discharge the powers and duties of his office" and cause the Vice President to serve as Acting President, before August 2024 (Eastern time). The duration of the incapacity does not matter for this question. Biden exiting the office of the Presidency by death, resignation, etc does not count. Biden invoking section 3 of the 25th amendment does not count.

para_P.title: Will the following events take place prior to their designated deadlines: (a) Donald Trump gives testimony at the hush money trial (b) Israel conducts a lethal strike within Iran (c) Biden is deemed incapacitated under Section 4 of the 25th Amendment?
para_P.body: This inquiry will resolve as **Yes** only if all of the subsequent criteria are satisfied: (a) Reliable sources confirm that Donald Trump has provided testimony, either in person or via remote means, at the trial related to the so-called "hush money" payments to Stormy Daniels, prior to May 1, 2024; (b) Trustworthy reports suggest that an assault attributed to Israel, occurring within the borders of Iran, has resulted in the deaths of at least five people, from the date of this question's publication until May 1, 2024; and (c) The Vice President and a majority of the Cabinet (or another appropriate body) invoke Section 4 of the 25th Amendment to officially declare that "the President is unable to fulfill the powers and responsibilities of his office" and allow the Vice President to act as President, before August 2024 (Eastern time). The length of the incapacity is irrelevant for this question. Biden leaving the Presidency due to death, resignation, etc. does not count. Biden invoking Section 3 of the 25th Amendment does not count.

question.title: Will a terrorist act occur in metropolitan France during the 2024 Summer Olympics?
question.body:
The question will resolve as Yes if a terrorist attack in [Metropolitan France](https://en.m.wikipedia.org/wiki/Metropolitan_France) injures and/or kills at least one person, other than the terrorist(s), between, and inclusive of, the day of the Opening Ceremony (26 July 2024) and the day of the Closing Ceremony (11 August 2024). The question will resolve as No if the above does not happen.

An event will be considered a 'terrorist attack' if it is described as such by any agency of the State of France, or by the French President, Prime Minister, or a member of the Council of Ministers.

para_P.title: Is a terrorist incident expected to take place in metropolitan France during the Summer Olympics of 2024?
para_P.body:
This inquiry will be answered with a Yes if a terrorist incident in [Metropolitan France](https://en.m.wikipedia.org/wiki/Metropolitan_France) results in injuries and/or fatalities involving at least one individual, excluding the terrorist(s), from the day of the Opening Ceremony (26 July 2024) to the day of the Closing Ceremony (11 August 2024), inclusive. Conversely, the answer will be No if the aforementioned conditions are not met.

An occurrence will be identified as a 'terrorist incident' if it is labeled as such by any official agency of the French State, or by the President, Prime Minister, or a member of the Council of Ministers of France.

question.title: Conditional on a terrorist act occurring in metropolitan France during the 2024 Summer Olympics, will the EU announce new tariffs on Chinese electric vehicles before July 5, 2024?
question.body:
Suppose the following is true: A terrorist attack occurs in metropolitan France during the 2024 Summer Olympics, injuring and/or killing at least one person, other than the terrorist(s), between, and inclusive of, the day of the Opening Ceremony (26 July 2024) and the day of the Closing Ceremony (11 August 2024). An event is considered a 'terrorist attack' if it is described as such by any agency of the State of France, or by the French President, Prime Minister, or a member of the Council of Ministers.

Then, will the European Union announce new tariffs or duties on imports of Chinese electric vehicles before July 5, 2024? This resolves as Yes if credible sources report that the EU has announced new tariffs or duties on Chinese electric vehicles into the EU before July 5, 2024. If the condition is not met, the question resolves as N/A.

para_P.title: If a terrorist incident takes place in metropolitan France during the 2024 Summer Olympics, will the EU implement new tariffs on Chinese electric vehicles prior to July 5, 2024?
para_P.body:
Assume the following scenario holds: A terrorist incident occurs in metropolitan France during the 2024 Summer Olympics, resulting in injuries and/or fatalities to at least one individual, other than the terrorist(s), between the Opening Ceremony (26 July 2024) and the Closing Ceremony (11 August 2024). An incident qualifies as a 'terrorist incident' if it is characterized as such by any agency of the French State, or by the French President, Prime Minister, or a member of the Council of Ministers.

In that case, will the European Union put in place new tariffs or duties on the importation of Chinese electric vehicles before July 5, 2024? This will be considered a Yes if reliable sources indicate that the EU has enacted new tariffs or duties on Chinese electric vehicles before July 5, 2024. If the condition is not satisfied, the question will be classified as N/A.

question.title: Given both a terrorist act in metropolitan France during the 2024 Summer Olympics and EU tariffs on Chinese EVs, will Democrats have a brokered convention in 2024?
question.body:
Suppose the following is true: (1) A terrorist act occurs in metropolitan France during the 2024 Summer Olympics, which injures or kills at least one person (other than the terrorist(s)) between July 26 and August 11, 2024, and is described as a 'terrorist attack' by an official French source. (2) The European Union announces new tariffs or duties on imports of Chinese electric vehicles before July 5, 2024, as reported by credible sources.

Then, will the Democratic Party require more than one round of voting in its roll call ballot to formally nominate its candidate for the 2024 US presidential election, thus having a brokered convention? The question resolves as **Yes** if more than one round of voting is required, and **No** if only one ballot is needed.

para_P.title: In light of a terrorist incident occurring in metropolitan France during the 2024 Summer Olympics and the implementation of EU tariffs on Chinese electric vehicles, will the Democratic Party experience a brokered convention in 2024?
para_P.body:
Assuming the following conditions hold: (1) A terrorist incident takes place in metropolitan France during the 2024 Summer Olympics, resulting in injuries or fatalities to at least one individual (excluding the terrorist(s)) between July 26 and August 11, 2024, and is officially classified as a 'terrorist attack' by a French authority. (2) Prior to July 5, 2024, the European Union imposes new tariffs or duties on the importation of Chinese electric vehicles, as reported by reliable sources.

Under these circumstances, will the Democratic Party need to conduct more than one round of voting in its roll call ballot to officially nominate its candidate for the 2024 US presidential election, thereby leading to a brokered convention? The answer is **Yes** if more than one round of voting is necessary, and **No** if only a single ballot suffices.

question.title: Will all of the following occur: (1) A terrorist act occurs in metropolitan France during the 2024 Summer Olympics, (2) The European Union announces new tariffs or duties on imports of Chinese electric vehicles before July 5, 2024, and (3) Democrats have a brokered convention in 2024?
question.body:
(1) A terrorist act occurs in metropolitan France during the 2024 Summer Olympics: The question will resolve as Yes if a terrorist attack in [Metropolitan France](https://en.m.wikipedia.org/wiki/Metropolitan_France) injures and/or kills at least one person, other than the terrorist(s), between, and inclusive of, the day of the Opening Ceremony (26 July 2024) and the day of the Closing Ceremony (11 August 2024). The question will resolve as No if the above does not happen. An event will be considered a 'terrorist attack' if it is described as such by any agency of the State of France, or by the French President, Prime Minister, or a member of the Council of Ministers.

(2) The European Union announces new tariffs or duties on imports of Chinese electric vehicles before July 5, 2024: This question will resolve as Yes if, before July 5, 2024, credible sources report that the European Union (EU) has announced that new tariffs or duties will be imposed that would apply to imports of Chinese electric vehicles into the EU.

(3) Democrats have a brokered convention in 2024: This question resolves as Yes if the Democratic Party requires more than one round of voting in its roll call ballot to formally nominate its candidate for the 2024 US presidential election. If only one ballot is required, then this question resolves as No.

para_P.title: Is it certain that the following will take place: (1) A terrorist incident happens in metropolitan France during the 2024 Summer Olympics, (2) The European Union imposes new tariffs or duties on the importation of Chinese electric vehicles prior to July 5, 2024, and (3) The Democratic Party holds a brokered convention in 2024?
para_P.body:
(1) A terrorist incident happens in metropolitan France during the 2024 Summer Olympics: The question will be answered with Yes if a terrorist act in [Metropolitan France](https://en.m.wikipedia.org/wiki/Metropolitan_France) causes injury and/or death to at least one individual, other than the terrorist(s), between the day of the Opening Ceremony (26 July 2024) and the day of the Closing Ceremony (11 August 2024). The question will be answered with No if the aforementioned does not occur. An event will be classified as a 'terrorist incident' if it is labeled as such by any governmental body of France, or by the French President, Prime Minister, or a member of the Council of Ministers.

(2) The European Union imposes new tariffs or duties on the importation of Chinese electric vehicles prior to July 5, 2024: This question will be answered with Yes if, before July 5, 2024, reliable sources indicate that the European Union (EU) has declared that new tariffs or duties will be enforced that would apply to the importation of Chinese electric vehicles into the EU.

(3) The Democratic Party holds a brokered convention in 2024: This question will be answered with Yes if the Democratic Party necessitates more than one round of voting in its roll call ballot to officially nominate its candidate for the 2024 US presidential election. If only one ballot is needed, then this question will be answered with No.

question.title: Will the Crimean Bridge be hit with an attack before July 1, 2024?
question.body: This question will resolve as **Yes** if, after May 2, 2024, and before the listed date, [credible sources](https://www.metaculus.com/help/faq/#definitions) report that the Crimean Bridge has been struck with weapons fire, explosives, or projectiles that could pose a credible threat to the integrity of the bridge.

para_P.title: Will the Crimean Bridge experience an assault prior to July 1, 2024?
para_P.body: This inquiry will conclude as **Yes** if, following May 2, 2024, and before the specified date, [reliable sources](https://www.metaculus.com/help/faq/#definitions) indicate that the Crimean Bridge has been impacted by gunfire, explosives, or projectiles that could represent a significant danger to the bridge's structural integrity.

question.title: Given the Crimean Bridge is attacked before July 1, 2024, will Biden drop out before July 13, 2024?
question.body:
Suppose the following is true: The Crimean Bridge is hit with an attack before July 1, 2024. This will resolve as **Yes** if, after May 2, 2024, and before the listed date, credible sources report that the Crimean Bridge has been struck with weapons fire, explosives, or projectiles that could pose a credible threat to the integrity of the bridge.

Then, is the following true: Biden drops out or is otherwise unable to continue his run as president before midnight July 13 Central Time. If this occurs, the market will resolve to yes. Otherwise, it will resolve to NO.

para_P.title: If the Crimean Bridge is attacked prior to July 1, 2024, will Biden withdraw from the presidential race before July 13, 2024?
para_P.body:
Assuming the following is accurate: The Crimean Bridge experiences an attack before July 1, 2024. This will be considered **Yes** if, after May 2, 2024, and before the specified date, credible reports indicate that the Crimean Bridge has been targeted with gunfire, explosives, or projectiles that could threaten the structural integrity of the bridge.

Then, is it true that Biden will either withdraw or be otherwise unable to pursue his presidential campaign before midnight on July 13 Central Time? If this happens, the market will resolve to yes. If not, it will resolve to NO.

question.title: If both the Crimean Bridge is attacked and Biden drops out before July 2024, will Asa Hutchinson be the Republican nominee for the 2024 US Presidential Election?
question.body:
This question resolves as **Yes** if all of the following are true:
1. After May 2, 2024, and before July 1, 2024, credible sources report that the Crimean Bridge has been struck with weapons fire, explosives, or projectiles that could pose a credible threat to the integrity of the bridge.
2. Biden drops out or is otherwise unable to continue his run as president before midnight July 13, 2024, Central Time.
3. Asa Hutchinson is selected by the Republican National Convention as the nominee for the 2024 US Presidential Election.

If any of the first two conditions are not met, the resolution is N/A. If the first two conditions are met, but Asa Hutchinson is not selected as the nominee, the resolution is **No**.

para_P.title: In the event that both the Crimean Bridge suffers an attack and Biden withdraws from the race prior to July 2024, will Asa Hutchinson become the Republican candidate for the 2024 US Presidential Election?
para_P.body:
This inquiry is resolved as **Yes** if all of the following statements are accurate:
1. Between May 2, 2024, and July 1, 2024, reliable sources confirm that the Crimean Bridge has been targeted by weapons, explosives, or projectiles that could significantly threaten the bridge's integrity.
2. Biden withdraws from the presidential race or is otherwise incapacitated before midnight on July 13, 2024, Central Time.
3. Asa Hutchinson is chosen by the Republican National Convention as the candidate for the 2024 US Presidential Election.

If either of the first two criteria is not satisfied, the resolution is N/A. If the first two criteria are satisfied, but Asa Hutchinson is not chosen as the candidate, the resolution is **No**.

question.title: Will all of the following occur: (a) After May 2, 2024, and before July 1, 2024, the Crimean Bridge be hit with an attack, (b) Biden drop out before July 13, 2024, and (c) Asa Hutchinson be the Republican nominee for the 2024 US Presidential Election?
question.body: This question will resolve as **Yes** if all of the following conditions are met: (1) After May 2, 2024, and before July 1, 2024, credible sources report that the Crimean Bridge has been struck with weapons fire, explosives, or projectiles that could pose a credible threat to the integrity of the bridge. (2) Biden drops out or is otherwise unable to continue his run as president before midnight July 13, 2024, Central Time. (3) Asa Hutchinson is selected by the Republican National Convention as the nominee for the 2024 US Presidential Election. If any of these conditions is not met, this question will resolve as NO.

para_P.title: Is it possible that the following events will take place: (a) Between May 2, 2024, and July 1, 2024, the Crimean Bridge is attacked, (b) Biden withdraws from the race prior to July 13, 2024, and (c) Asa Hutchinson becomes the Republican candidate for the 2024 US Presidential Election?
para_P.body: This inquiry will be considered **Yes** if all of the subsequent conditions are satisfied: (1) Between May 2, 2024, and July 1, 2024, reliable sources indicate that the Crimean Bridge has been impacted by gunfire, explosives, or projectiles that might threaten the structural integrity of the bridge. (2) Biden withdraws or is otherwise incapacitated from his presidential campaign before midnight on July 13, 2024, Central Time. (3) Asa Hutchinson is nominated by the Republican National Convention as the candidate for the 2024 US Presidential Election. If any of these conditions are unmet, this question will resolve as NO.

question.title: Will Iceland qualify for the Grand Final in Eurovision 2024?
question.body: This question will resolve as **Yes** if Iceland participates in a Semi-final and is officially announced by the European Broadcasting Union (EBU) as having qualified for the Eurovision 2024 Grand Final. If not, the question will resolve as **No**.

para_P.title: Is Iceland set to make it to the Grand Final in Eurovision 2024?
para_P.body: This inquiry will conclude with a **Yes** if Iceland competes in a Semi-final and is officially recognized by the European Broadcasting Union (EBU) as having advanced to the Grand Final of Eurovision 2024. Otherwise, it will resolve as **No**.

question.title: Given Iceland qualifies for the Grand Final in Eurovision 2024, will Poland also qualify?
question.body:
Suppose the following is true: Iceland participates in a Semi-final and is officially announced by the European Broadcasting Union (EBU) as having qualified for the Eurovision 2024 Grand Final. 

Then, will Poland participate in a Semi-final and be officially announced by the EBU as having qualified for the Eurovision 2024 Grand Final? If Poland does not qualify, the question will resolve as **No**.

para_P.title: If Iceland secures a spot in the Grand Final of Eurovision 2024, will Poland also make it through?
para_P.body:
Assuming the following holds true: Iceland takes part in a Semi-final and the European Broadcasting Union (EBU) confirms its qualification for the Grand Final of Eurovision 2024. 

In that case, will Poland also compete in a Semi-final and be confirmed by the EBU as having qualified for the Grand Final of Eurovision 2024? If Poland fails to qualify, the answer will be **No**.

question.title: Given both Iceland and Poland qualify for the Grand Final in Eurovision 2024, will Georgia also qualify?
question.body:
Suppose the following is true: Both Iceland and Poland participate in a Semi-final and are officially announced by the European Broadcasting Union (EBU) as having qualified for the Eurovision 2024 Grand Final. Then, will Georgia also qualify for the Grand Final? 

Resolution criteria for the condition: The question resolves as **Yes** if both Iceland and Poland qualify for the Grand Final. If either does not qualify, the condition is not met.

Resolution criteria for the outcome: Resolves as **Yes** if Georgia participates in a Semi-final and is officially announced by the EBU as having qualified for the Eurovision 2024 Grand Final. For any other outcome, it resolves as **No**.

para_P.title: If both Iceland and Poland make it to the Grand Final in Eurovision 2024, will Georgia also make it?
para_P.body:
Assuming the following is accurate: Both Iceland and Poland take part in a Semi-final and are officially declared by the European Broadcasting Union (EBU) as having secured their spots in the Eurovision 2024 Grand Final. In that case, will Georgia also secure a spot in the Grand Final? 

Resolution criteria for the condition: The question resolves as **Yes** if both Iceland and Poland make it to the Grand Final. If either fails to qualify, the condition is not satisfied.

Resolution criteria for the outcome: Resolves as **Yes** if Georgia competes in a Semi-final and is officially confirmed by the EBU as having qualified for the Eurovision 2024 Grand Final. For any other result, it resolves as **No**.

question.title: Will Iceland, Poland, and Georgia all qualify for the Grand Final in Eurovision 2024?
question.body: This question will resolve as **Yes** if all of the following occur: (a) Iceland participates in a Semi-final and is officially announced by the European Broadcasting Union (EBU) as having qualified for the Eurovision 2024 Grand Final, (b) Poland participates in a Semi-final and is officially announced by the European Broadcasting Union (EBU) as having qualified for the Eurovision 2024 Grand Final, and (c) Georgia participates in a Semi-final and is officially announced by the European Broadcasting Union (EBU) as having qualified for the Eurovision 2024 Grand Final. If any of Iceland, Poland, or Georgia does not qualify, the question will resolve as **No**.

para_P.title: Are Iceland, Poland, and Georgia set to make it to the Grand Final in Eurovision 2024?
para_P.body: This inquiry will conclude with a **Yes** if all of the following conditions are met: (a) Iceland takes part in a Semi-final and is officially declared by the European Broadcasting Union (EBU) as having secured a spot in the Eurovision 2024 Grand Final, (b) Poland takes part in a Semi-final and is officially declared by the European Broadcasting Union (EBU) as having secured a spot in the Eurovision 2024 Grand Final, and (c) Georgia takes part in a Semi-final and is officially declared by the European Broadcasting Union (EBU) as having secured a spot in the Eurovision 2024 Grand Final. If any of Iceland, Poland, or Georgia fails to qualify, the inquiry will resolve with a **No**.

question.title: Will OpenAI's ChatGPT be generally available in the European Union on June 30, 2024?
question.body:
The question resolves as **YES** if [ChatGPT](chat.openai.com) is generally available in the EU on June 30, 2024, and **NO** otherwise.

"Generally available" here means that the default state for people in the EU is that they can access it without a VPN (possibly requiring paying for it.) If unavailable in certain EU countries (as was the case in Italy in early 2023), or unavailable to (for example) minors, this will still resolve positively, assuming at least >50% of the population can use it.

"ChatGPT" here refers to the general web interface (not the API) for interacting with GPT models. Still resolves positively if the name or website has changed, as long as OpenAI's service is substantially the same (entering queries to systems based on Large Language Models).

para_P.title: Will OpenAI's ChatGPT be accessible to the public in the European Union by June 30, 2024?
para_P.body:
This inquiry will be answered with **YES** if [ChatGPT](chat.openai.com) is accessible to the public in the EU by June 30, 2024, and **NO** if it is not.

Here, "accessible to the public" indicates that the standard situation for individuals in the EU is that they can use it without needing a VPN (though it may require a payment). If it is not accessible in some EU nations (as was the scenario in Italy in early 2023), or if it is restricted for certain groups (like minors), it will still be considered a positive outcome, provided that over 50% of the population can utilize it.

"ChatGPT" in this context pertains to the general web platform (not the API) for engaging with GPT models. It will still be regarded as a positive outcome if the branding or website changes, as long as OpenAI's service remains fundamentally the same (inputting queries into systems powered by Large Language Models).

question.title: Given ChatGPT is generally available in the EU on June 30, 2024, will Russia control Chasiv Yar on June 1, 2024?
question.body:
Suppose the following is true: ChatGPT is generally available in the European Union on June 30, 2024. "Generally available" means that the default state for people in the EU is that they can access it without a VPN, possibly requiring payment, and at least >50% of the population can use it. "ChatGPT" refers to the general web interface for interacting with GPT models, even if the name or website has changed, as long as OpenAI's service is substantially the same.

Then, is it true that Russia will have control of Chasiv Yar on June 1, 2024? This resolves as **Yes** if, when accessed by Metaculus on June 1, 2024, the ISW map shows the coordinates 48°35'13.7"N 37°50'02.1"E under categories indicating Russian control, such as "Assessed Russian Advance in Ukraine," "Assessed Russian Gains in the Past 24 Hours," "Assessed Russian Control," "Claimed Russian Territory in Ukraine," or any other categories indicating Russian control. It resolves as **No** if the location is not assessed to be in any categories indicating Russian control, including "Reported Ukrainian Territorial Gains in the Past 24 Hours," "Claimed Ukrainian Counteroffensives," "Reported Ukrainian Partisan Warfare," or any other categories indicating Ukrainian control or lack of Russian control.

para_P.title: With ChatGPT becoming widely accessible in the EU on June 30, 2024, will Chasiv Yar be under Russian control on June 1, 2024?
para_P.body:
Assuming the following holds true: ChatGPT will be widely accessible in the European Union starting June 30, 2024. "Widely accessible" implies that the standard situation for individuals in the EU is that they can utilize it without needing a VPN, potentially involving a fee, and that over 50% of the populace can access it. "ChatGPT" pertains to the standard web interface for engaging with GPT models, even if the branding or website changes, as long as OpenAI's service remains fundamentally the same.

Then, is it accurate to say that Russia will have authority over Chasiv Yar on June 1, 2024? This will be determined as **Yes** if, as assessed by Metaculus on June 1, 2024, the ISW map displays the coordinates 48°35'13.7"N 37°50'02.1"E under classifications indicating Russian control, such as "Assessed Russian Advance in Ukraine," "Assessed Russian Gains in the Past 24 Hours," "Assessed Russian Control," "Claimed Russian Territory in Ukraine," or any other categories signifying Russian control. It will be determined as **No** if the location is not categorized under any classifications indicating Russian control, including "Reported Ukrainian Territorial Gains in the Past 24 Hours," "Claimed Ukrainian Counteroffensives," "Reported Ukrainian Partisan Warfare," or any other categories indicating Ukrainian control or absence of Russian control.

question.title: Conditional on both ChatGPT being available in the EU and Russia controlling Chasiv Yar, will the ID political group hold the most seats after the 2024 European Parliamentary Elections?
question.body:
Suppose the following is true: (a) ChatGPT is generally available in the EU on June 30, 2024, meaning that the default state for people in the EU is that they can access it without a VPN, possibly requiring payment, and that it is available to at least >50% of the population. This includes possible restrictions to certain countries or demographics, but the service remains substantially the same as OpenAI's general web interface for interacting with GPT models.

(b) On June 1, 2024, the Institute for the Study of War (ISW) map shows the coordinates 48°35'13.7"N 37°50'02.1"E as under any category indicating Russian control, such as Assessed Russian Control or Claimed Russian Territory in Ukraine.

Then, will the ID political group hold the most seats after the 2024 European Parliamentary Elections? This resolves as **Yes** if the ID political group holds the most seats based on official statements by the European Parliament or credible media reports. If two groups are tied for seats, both will resolve as **Yes**.

para_P.title: If both ChatGPT is accessible in the EU and Russia has authority over Chasiv Yar, will the ID political faction secure the highest number of seats following the 2024 European Parliamentary Elections?
para_P.body:
Assuming the following conditions are satisfied: (a) As of June 30, 2024, ChatGPT is widely available in the EU, meaning that individuals in the EU can access it without using a VPN, potentially requiring payment, and that it is accessible to more than 50% of the population. This may include certain restrictions for specific countries or demographics, but the service remains largely equivalent to OpenAI's standard web interface for engaging with GPT models.

(b) On June 1, 2024, the Institute for the Study of War (ISW) map indicates that the coordinates 48°35'13.7"N 37°50'02.1"E fall under any category suggesting Russian control, such as Assessed Russian Control or Claimed Russian Territory in Ukraine.

Consequently, will the ID political faction secure the highest number of seats after the 2024 European Parliamentary Elections? This will be answered as **Yes** if the ID political faction holds the most seats based on official announcements from the European Parliament or reliable media sources. If there is a tie in the number of seats between two groups, both will be considered as **Yes**.

question.title: Will all of the following occur: (a) ChatGPT be generally available in the EU on June 30, 2024, (b) Russia have control of Chasiv Yar on June 1, 2024, and (c) the ID political group hold the most seats after the 2024 European Parliamentary Elections?
question.body:
(a) The question resolves as **YES** if ChatGPT is generally available in the EU on June 30, 2024, and **NO** otherwise. "Generally available" means that the default state for people in the EU is that they can access it without a VPN (possibly requiring paying for it.) If unavailable in certain EU countries (as was the case in Italy in early 2023), or unavailable to (for example) minors, this will still resolve positively, assuming at least >50% of the population can use it. "ChatGPT" here refers to the general web interface (not the API) for interacting with GPT models. Still resolves positively if the name or website has changed, as long as OpenAI's service is substantially the same (entering queries to systems based on Large Language Models).

(b) This question will resolve as **Yes** if, when accessed by Metaculus on June 1, 2024, the Institute for the Study of War (ISW) map shows the coordinates 48°35'13.7"N 37°50'02.1"E as under any of the following categories: Assessed Russian Advance in Ukraine, Assessed Russian Gains in the Past 24 Hours, Assessed Russian Control, Claimed Russian Territory in Ukraine, or any other categories created by ISW that indicate Russian control of the location. The question will resolve as **No** if the location is not assessed to be in any of the categories indicating Russian control, which includes but is not limited to: Reported Ukrainian Territorial Gains in the Past 24 Hours, Claimed Ukrainian Counteroffensives, Reported Ukrainian Partisan Warfare, or any other categories created by ISW that indicate Ukrainian control of the location or a lack of Russian control of the location.

(c) This question will resolve as **Yes** if the ID political group holds the most seats after the 2024 European Parliament elections. It will resolve as **No** for all other political groups. If two groups are tied for seats, both sub-questions will resolve as **Yes**.

This question resolves on the basis of [official statements by the European Parliament](https://www.europarl.europa.eu/portal/en) or credible media reports.

para_P.title: Will the following three events take place: (a) ChatGPT will be widely accessible in the EU by June 30, 2024, (b) Russia will possess Chasiv Yar on June 1, 2024, and (c) the ID political faction will secure the highest number of seats after the 2024 European Parliamentary Elections?
para_P.body:
(a) This question will be answered with **YES** if ChatGPT is widely accessible in the EU by June 30, 2024, and **NO** otherwise. "Widely accessible" means that the default condition for individuals in the EU is that they can use it without needing a VPN (possibly requiring payment). If it is not available in specific EU nations (as was the situation in Italy in early 2023), or if it is inaccessible to certain groups (for example, minors), it will still be considered positively, provided that over 50% of the population can access it. Here, "ChatGPT" refers to the public web interface (not the API) for engaging with GPT models. It will still be considered positively even if the name or website changes, as long as OpenAI's service remains fundamentally the same (inputting queries to systems based on Large Language Models).

(b) This question will be considered **Yes** if, as of June 1, 2024, the Institute for the Study of War (ISW) map indicates that the coordinates 48°35'13.7"N 37°50'02.1"E fall under any of the following classifications: Assessed Russian Advance in Ukraine, Assessed Russian Gains in the Past 24 Hours, Assessed Russian Control, Claimed Russian Territory in Ukraine, or any other classifications established by ISW that signify Russian control of that area. The question will be marked **No** if the site is not classified under any categories that denote Russian control, which includes but is not limited to: Reported Ukrainian Territorial Gains in the Past 24 Hours, Claimed Ukrainian Counteroffensives, Reported Ukrainian Partisan Warfare, or any other classifications made by ISW that indicate Ukrainian control of the area or a lack of Russian control.

(c) This question will be answered with **Yes** if the ID political faction has the most seats following the 2024 European Parliament elections. It will be marked **No** for any other political factions. If there is a tie between two factions for the number of seats, both sub-questions will be answered positively.

question.title: Will a group of at least 5 named Dem House Members or US Senators pressure Biden to drop out before July 20th?
question.body:
Politico reports:

Two safe-seat members have already publicly urged Biden out. Two of the most endangered Democrats told local news outlets they’ve already written off Biden’s chances to win in November.

Behind the scenes, things are even more frenzied. There are multiple drafts of letters circulating among House Democrats and at least one would call on Biden to end his campaign, according to five people familiar with the efforts.

This market resolves YES if a group of at least five named Democratic Party US House Members/US Senators work together to ask Joe Biden to consider ending his 2024 re-election campaign, or to urge him to do so, before Saturday July 20th (Pacific Time).

This could be by signing a letter like what is reported above, but it could also be in another form such as a group speaking with Biden in person and collectively asking him to drop out.

This market requires that all five individuals be part of the same group message. Five people separately telling reporters they think Biden should drop out is not sufficient for a YES resolution.

Reports of any number of unnamed democrats writing to Biden and asking him to step aside will not satisfy this market's criteria unless at least 5 qualifying names are later made public before this market's end date. In any ambiguous cases where such names are reported but not confirmed beyond a reasonable doubt, this market will err towards resolving NO. 

If these criteria are not met before July 20th, this market resolves NO.

para_P.title: Will a collective of no fewer than 5 identified Democratic House Members or US Senators persuade Biden to withdraw from the race prior to July 20th?
para_P.body:
According to Politico:

Two members from secure districts have already publicly called for Biden to step aside. Additionally, two of the most vulnerable Democrats have stated to local news outlets that they have dismissed Biden’s prospects for victory in November.

Behind the scenes, the situation is even more chaotic. There are several versions of letters circulating among House Democrats, and at least one of them would request Biden to conclude his campaign, as reported by five individuals familiar with the situation.

This market will conclude with a YES if a collective of at least five identified Democratic Party US House Members or US Senators collaborate to urge Joe Biden to contemplate ending his 2024 re-election campaign, or to strongly encourage him to do so, before Saturday, July 20th (Pacific Time).

This could take the form of signing a letter similar to what has been reported, or it could involve a group meeting with Biden in person to collectively request that he withdraw.

This market stipulates that all five individuals must be part of the same group communication. Five individuals independently expressing to reporters that they believe Biden should withdraw is insufficient for a YES resolution.

Reports of any number of unnamed Democrats reaching out to Biden and requesting him to step aside will not fulfill this market's requirements unless at least five qualifying names are disclosed publicly before the market's closing date. In any unclear situations where such names are mentioned but not confirmed beyond a reasonable doubt, this market will lean towards a NO resolution.

If these conditions are not satisfied before July 20th, this market will resolve NO.

question.title: Conditional on a group of at least 5 named Democratic House Members or US Senators pressuring Biden to drop out before July 20th, will Nvidia's market capitalization be larger than Apple's on July 17, 2024?
question.body:
Politico reports:

Two safe-seat members have already publicly urged Biden out. Two of the most endangered Democrats told local news outlets they’ve already written off Biden’s chances to win in November.

Behind the scenes, things are even more frenzied. There are multiple drafts of letters circulating among House Democrats and at least one would call on Biden to end his campaign, according to five people familiar with the efforts.

This market resolves YES if a group of at least five named Democratic Party US House Members/US Senators work together to ask Joe Biden to consider ending his 2024 re-election campaign, or to urge him to do so, before Saturday July 20th (Pacific Time).

This could be by signing a letter like what is reported above, but it could also be in another form such as a group speaking with Biden in person and collectively asking him to drop out.

This market requires that all five individuals be part of the same group message. Five people separately telling reporters they think Biden should drop out is not sufficient for a YES resolution.

Reports of any number of unnamed democrats writing to Biden and asking him to step aside will not satisfy this market's criteria unless at least 5 qualifying names are later made public before this market's end date. In any ambiguous cases where such names are reported but not confirmed beyond a reasonable doubt, this market will err towards resolving NO. 

If these criteria are not met before July 20th, this market resolves NO.

Resolution criteria for the outcome: This question resolves Yes if, on July 17, 2024, the market cap of Nvidia is greater than that of Apple, according to Companies Market Cap, when checked by Metaculus at approximately 4 PM EDT (8 PM UTC).

para_P.title: If a coalition of a minimum of 5 identified Democratic House Representatives or US Senators press Biden to withdraw from the race prior to July 20th, will Nvidia's valuation exceed that of Apple on July 17, 2024?
para_P.body:
According to Politico:

Two members in secure districts have already called for Biden to step aside. Additionally, two of the most vulnerable Democrats have expressed to local media that they believe Biden's chances for victory in November are slim.

Behind closed doors, the situation is even more chaotic. There are several drafts of letters being shared among House Democrats, with at least one draft urging Biden to withdraw from the race, as reported by five sources familiar with the discussions.

This market will be marked YES if a coalition of at least five named Democratic Party US House Representatives or US Senators collectively request that Joe Biden consider halting his 2024 re-election campaign, or actively encourage him to do so, before Saturday, July 20th (Pacific Time).

This could involve signing a letter similar to the reports mentioned above, or it could take the form of a group meeting with Biden in person to collectively ask him to withdraw.

It is essential that all five individuals participate in the same group communication. If five individuals independently express to the media that they believe Biden should withdraw, it will not be enough for a YES outcome.

Reports of any number of unnamed Democrats reaching out to Biden and requesting that he step aside will not fulfill the requirements of this market unless at least five qualifying names are disclosed publicly before the market closes. In cases where names are reported but not confirmed with a reasonable level of certainty, this market will lean towards a NO resolution.

If these conditions are not satisfied before July 20th, the market will resolve as NO.

Resolution criteria for the outcome: This question will resolve as Yes if, on July 17, 2024, Nvidia's market capitalization surpasses that of Apple, according to Companies Market Cap, as verified by Metaculus at approximately 4 PM EDT (8 PM UTC).

question.title: Given that both (1) at least 5 named Democratic House Members or Senators pressure Biden to drop out before July 20th, 2024, and (2) Nvidia's market cap is larger than Apple's on July 17, 2024, will the CBOE S&P 500 3-Month Volatility Index be higher Year-over-Year on July 20, 2024?
question.body:
Suppose the following conditions are true:

(1) At least 5 named Democratic Party US House Members or US Senators work together to ask Joe Biden to consider ending his 2024 re-election campaign, or urge him to do so, before Saturday, July 20th, 2024 (Pacific Time). This could be by signing a letter or in another form such as a group speaking with Biden in person. All five individuals must be part of the same group message. Five people separately telling reporters they think Biden should drop out is not sufficient. Reports of any number of unnamed Democrats writing to Biden and asking him to step aside will not satisfy this criterion unless at least 5 qualifying names are later made public before the end date.

(2) On July 17, 2024, Nvidia's market capitalization is larger than Apple's, as determined by checking Companies Market Cap at approximately 4 PM EDT (8 PM UTC) on that day.

Then, will the CBOE S&P 500 3-Month Volatility Index (VXVCLS) be higher Year-over-Year on July 20, 2024? This will resolve based on reporting by the St. Louis Fed: https://fred.stlouisfed.org/series/VXVCLS. The reported number for July 20, 2024 must be greater than the reported number on July 20, 2023. If both conditions are not met, the question resolves N/A.

para_P.title: If at least 5 specified Democratic House Members or Senators urge Biden to withdraw from the race before July 20, 2024, and Nvidia's market value exceeds that of Apple's on July 17, 2024, will the CBOE S&P 500 3-Month Volatility Index be greater Year-over-Year on July 20, 2024?
para_P.body:
Assuming the following criteria hold:

(1) A minimum of 5 identified Democratic US House Members or Senators collaborate to persuade Joe Biden to consider stepping down from his 2024 re-election bid, or to encourage him to do so, prior to Saturday, July 20, 2024 (Pacific Time). This could occur through signing a letter or another method such as a group discussion with Biden in person. All five individuals must participate in the same collective communication. Five individuals independently informing reporters of their belief that Biden should withdraw is inadequate. Any reports of unnamed Democrats requesting Biden to resign will not fulfill this requirement unless at least 5 qualifying names are disclosed before the deadline.

(2) On July 17, 2024, Nvidia's market capitalization surpasses that of Apple, as verified by checking Companies Market Cap around 4 PM EDT (8 PM UTC) on that date.

Then, will the CBOE S&P 500 3-Month Volatility Index (VXVCLS) show a Year-over-Year increase on July 20, 2024? This will be determined based on data from the St. Louis Fed: https://fred.stlouisfed.org/series/VXVCLS. The figure for July 20, 2024 must exceed the figure for July 20, 2023. If either condition is unmet, the question will resolve as N/A.

question.title: Will all of the following occur: (1) At least 5 named Dem House Members or US Senators pressure Biden to drop out before July 20th, 2024, (2) Nvidia's market capitalization be larger than Apple's on July 17, 2024, and (3) the CBOE S&P 500 3-Month Volatility Index (VXVCLS) be higher Year-over-Year on July 20, 2024?
question.body:
(1) At least 5 named Democratic Party US House Members or US Senators must work together to ask Joe Biden to consider ending his 2024 re-election campaign, or to urge him to do so, before Saturday, July 20th, 2024 (Pacific Time). This could be by signing a letter or in another form such as a group speaking with Biden in person. All five individuals must be part of the same group message. Five people separately telling reporters they think Biden should drop out is not sufficient. Reports of any number of unnamed Democrats writing to Biden and asking him to step aside will not satisfy this criterion unless at least 5 qualifying names are later made public before the end date. If these criteria are not met before July 20th, this part resolves NO.

(2) On July 17, 2024, Nvidia's market capitalization must be larger than Apple's. This is determined by checking Companies Market Cap at approximately 4 PM EDT (8 PM UTC) on that day.

(3) The CBOE S&P 500 3-Month Volatility Index (VXVCLS) must be higher on July 20, 2024, compared to its value on July 20, 2023. This will be verified based on reporting by the St. Louis Fed here: https://fred.stlouisfed.org/series/VXVCLS. The reported number for July 20, 2024 must be greater than the reported number on July 20, 2023.

para_P.title: Is it possible that all of the following will take place: (1) A minimum of 5 identified Democratic House Representatives or US Senators will urge Biden to withdraw from the race before July 20th, 2024, (2) Nvidia's market value will exceed that of Apple's on July 17, 2024, and (3) the CBOE S&P 500 3-Month Volatility Index (VXVCLS) will show a Year-over-Year increase on July 20, 2024?
para_P.body:
(1) A minimum of 5 identified members of the Democratic Party from either the US House of Representatives or the Senate must collaborate to request Joe Biden to contemplate ending his 2024 presidential campaign, or to encourage him to do so, prior to Saturday, July 20th, 2024 (Pacific Time). This could involve signing a letter or engaging in another form such as a group discussion with Biden in person. All five individuals must be part of the same collective communication. Five individuals separately expressing to reporters that they believe Biden should withdraw is inadequate. Any reports of an unspecified number of Democrats appealing to Biden for him to step down will not fulfill this requirement unless at least 5 qualifying names are subsequently disclosed before the deadline. If these conditions are not satisfied by July 20th, this segment will conclude with a NO.

(2) On July 17, 2024, Nvidia's market capitalization must surpass that of Apple. This will be assessed by reviewing the Companies Market Cap at approximately 4 PM EDT (8 PM UTC) on that date.

(3) The CBOE S&P 500 3-Month Volatility Index (VXVCLS) must be higher on July 20, 2024, in comparison to its value on July 20, 2023. This will be confirmed through data reported by the St. Louis Fed at the following link: https://fred.stlouisfed.org/series/VXVCLS. The figure reported for July 20, 2024 must exceed the figure reported on July 20, 2023.

question.title: Will the European Union announce new tariffs or duties on imports of Chinese electric vehicles before July 5, 2024?
question.body: This question will resolve as **Yes** if, before July 5, 2024, credible sources report that the European Union (EU) has announced that new tariffs or duties will be imposed that would apply to imports of Chinese electric vehicles into the EU.

para_P.title: Is it possible that the European Union will declare new tariffs or duties on the importation of Chinese electric vehicles prior to July 5, 2024?
para_P.body: This inquiry will be considered **Yes** if, before July 5, 2024, reliable sources indicate that the European Union (EU) has declared the imposition of new tariffs or duties on imports of Chinese electric vehicles into the EU.

question.title: Conditional on the EU announcing new tariffs on Chinese EVs, will Donald Trump be removed from a primary ballot under the 14th Amendment?
question.body:
Suppose the following is true: Before July 5, 2024, credible sources report that the European Union (EU) has announced that new tariffs or duties will be imposed on imports of Chinese electric vehicles into the EU. Then, will Donald Trump be removed or blocked from the primary election ballot of any U.S. state for a federal office under Section 3 of the 14th Amendment as of July 15, 2024?

Resolution criteria for the condition: The EU must announce new tariffs or duties on Chinese electric vehicles before July 5, 2024, as reported by credible sources.

Resolution criteria for the outcome: Donald Trump must be officially removed or blocked from the primary election ballot of any U.S. state for a federal office under the grounds of Section 3 of the 14th Amendment by July 15, 2024. This must be confirmed through official state government announcements, court decisions, legal documentation, or credible media reports. The question resolves as "No" if these conditions are not met as of July 15, 2024.

para_P.title: If the EU imposes new tariffs on Chinese electric vehicles, will Donald Trump face removal from a primary ballot due to the 14th Amendment?
para_P.body:
Assuming the following holds true: Before July 5, 2024, reliable sources indicate that the European Union (EU) has declared the imposition of new tariffs or duties on the importation of Chinese electric vehicles into the EU. In that case, will Donald Trump be excluded or prevented from appearing on the primary election ballot in any U.S. state for a federal position under Section 3 of the 14th Amendment by July 15, 2024?

Criteria for resolving the condition: The EU must declare new tariffs or duties on Chinese electric vehicles prior to July 5, 2024, as reported by trustworthy sources.

Criteria for resolving the outcome: Donald Trump must officially be removed or barred from the primary election ballot in any U.S. state for a federal position based on Section 3 of the 14th Amendment by July 15, 2024. This must be validated through official announcements from state governments, judicial rulings, legal documentation, or reliable media reports. The answer will be "No" if these conditions are not satisfied by July 15, 2024.
